traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: Fimble is a 9th-level spellcaster. Int is his casting mod (+8, DC 16). Cantrips: Mage Hand, Minor Illusion, Prestidigitation. 1st: Charm Person, Disguise Self. 2nd: Invisibility, Mirror Image. 3rd: Major Image, Hypnotic Pattern. 4th: Greater Invisibility.

traits.name: Cunning Action
traits.desc: Bonus action to Dash, Disengage, or Hide.

traits.name: Sentient Capital Aura
traits.desc: Anyone trading with Fimble must make a DC 16 Wis save or feel compelled to offer a memory.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two dagger attacks.

actions.name: Dagger of Lost Thoughts
actions.desc: +8 to hit, 20/60 ft. Hit: 1d4+4 piercing + 3d6 psychic. Target has disadvantage on next attack.

name: Kaelen Muldar

traits.name: Master of the Forge
traits.desc: Kaelen's attacks deal an extra 1d8 Fire damage (included).

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Two attacks with the Ghost-Hammer.

actions.name: The Ghost-Hammer
actions.desc: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 2d6+5 bludgeoning + 1d8 fire. Ignores resistance to non-magical attacks.

actions.name: Heat Metal (3/day)
actions.desc: Casts Heat Metal as a 3rd level spell (DC 15).

treasure: Hammer of the Iron Knot, Belt of Dwarvenkind

traits.name: Assassinate
traits.desc: Advantage vs creatures that haven't taken a turn. Auto-crit on hit if surprised.

traits.name: Sneak Attack
traits.desc: Once per turn, deal extra 6d6 damage if advantage or ally adjacent.

traits.name: Evasion
traits.desc: Half damage on failed Dex save, no damage on success.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Three attacks: two with rapier, one with hand crossbow.

actions.name: Rapier of Debt
actions.desc: +9 to hit, reach 5 ft. Hit: 1d8+5 piercing + 2d6 poison.

actions.name: Hand Crossbow
actions.desc: +9 to hit, range 30/120. Hit: 1d6+5 piercing + drow poison (DC 13 Con or poisoned 1hr).

name: Larloch the Shadow King
immunities: Necrotic, Poison; Bludgeoning, Piercing, and Slashing from Nonmagical Attacks

traits.name: Legendary Resistance (4/Day)
traits.desc: If Larloch fails a saving throw, he can choose to succeed instead.

traits.name: Master of Magic
traits.desc: Larloch casts spells of 1st through 5th level at will.

traits.name: Rejuvenation
traits.desc: If destroyed, Larloch gains a new body in 1d10 days, regaining all HP and becoming active again.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Larloch uses Frightful Presence. He then makes three attacks: two with Arcane Blast and one with Paralyzing Touch.

actions.name: Arcane Blast
actions.desc: +17 to hit, range 120 ft., one target. Hit: 4d10 + 10 Force damage.

actions.name: Paralyzing Touch
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +17 to hit, reach 5 ft., one creature. Hit: 3d6 cold damage. DC 24 Con save or be Paralyzed for 1 minute.

actions.name: Time Stop (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Larloch briefly stops the flow of time for everyone but himself.

legendary.name: Cast Spell (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.desc: Larloch casts a spell from his list.

legendary.name: Disrupt Life (Costs 3 Actions)
legendary.desc: Each non-undead creature within 20 ft. of Larloch must make a DC 24 Con save, taking 42 (12d6) necrotic damage on a failed save.

treasure: Staff of the Netherese Archon, Robe of the Archmagi

name: Ancient White Dracolich
speed: 40 ft., burrow 40 ft., fly 80 ft., swim 40 ft.

traits.name: Ice Walk
traits.desc: Can move across icy surfaces without ability checks. Difficult terrain composed of ice doesn't cost extra movement.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Uses Frightful Presence. Makes three attacks: one bite, two claws.

actions.name: Necrotic Frost Breath (Recharge 5-6)
actions.desc: 90-foot cone. DC 22 Con save, taking 72 (16d8) Cold plus 35 (10d6) Necrotic damage on fail.

legendary.name: Wing Attack (Costs 2 Actions)
legendary.desc: Beats wings. Each creature within 15 ft. DC 23 Dex save or take 15 (2d6+8) bludgeoning and be prone. Dracolich flies up to half speed.

traits.name: Assassinate
traits.desc: Advantage on attack rolls against creatures that haven't taken a turn. Hit is auto-crit if surprised.

traits.name: Shadow Step
traits.desc: Bonus action to teleport 60ft from dim light to dim light.

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: Makes three attacks with Dagger +2.

actions.name: Dagger +2
actions.desc: +13 to hit, reach 5ft. Hit: 1d4 + 8 piercing + 4d6 poison.

traits.name: The Blackstaff
traits.desc: Can drain magic from items or creatures. Advantage on saves vs spells.

actions.name: Blackstaff Strike
actions.desc: Melee Spell Attack: +15 to hit, 4d6+8 Force damage. Dispel Magic effect on hit.

actions.name: High Magic (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Cast any spell 7th level or lower instantly.

traits.name: Netherese Secrets
traits.desc: Can maintain 2 Concentration spells at once.

traits.name: Turn Resistance
traits.desc: Advantage on saves vs Turn Undead.

actions.name: Life Drain
actions.desc: +12 to hit, 4d6 Necrotic. Target max HP reduced.

actions.name: Iolum's Longevity (Recharge 6)
actions.desc: Pre-Mystra spell. Heals 100 HP, deals 50 necrotic to all enemies within 30ft.
